title: Ranked dynamic group looking for 1 more regular team member.
body:
Hi guys,

Our dynamic group is looking for one more player to play with us regularly and progress up in ranks. Currently we are ranged from silver 2 - Gold 1 in our personal ranks and we are looking for a fifth person around that range. We are interested in progressing more as a team than individual players so you will need to have a personality that is conducive to learning.

What we are looking for / requirements.

Must be able to play most days after 4pm.

Play one of these roles Support / Mid / Jungle. 

Must have a microphone and use it.

Must not be elitist / arrogant (this one is very important).

Must be prepared to lose some whilst we learn to work more effectively as a team and iron out play styles.

Must be able to listen to a shot caller.

If this sounds like you we'd be more than happy for you to give us a try and you may add me in game (Vucari). If you have any questions please feel free to respond to this thread or just message me in game.

Regards, 

Vucari

replies.body: Hi Im crispy. My normal group moved to WoW and i really want to climb with people. I am currently gold 4 and i can play mid/supp/adc although i definitely prefer mid lane. Happy to both have fun and play seriously. I can only play on weekend tho because of school.

Hi Crispy,

Know that feeling with wow, Former wow veteran myself, I think we have our guy for the moment but we are still checking him out seeing if he is a fit for our approach and personalities so I will keep you posted. Thank you very much for your interest though,

Regards

Vucari
Well, when you get to me, feel free to give me an add. Cheers.

Hey My name is IGN is Drizzer i have being looking for a serious rank team to join I was d4 when i was in NA so i moved to oce and had to start again it sucked but alg I am a adc main i be happy to be a sub :) ty

Hi Drizzer,

I think we have found our guy for the moment. You have fantastic ranked credentials however so I am sure you will find a team that perhaps better matches your skill level (we are working on ours for the moment). We are still trying our guy out so I will leave this open but thank you for your interest.

regards

Vucari

Hey guys we have for the moment found a mid lane player to try out, I'll keep this open as we are trying him out for the week to see if he fits our mentality.

Regards

Vucari

Hi Smoothie,

You have fantastic credentials and whilst we would love to have you on board I think we'd be a little under par for your skill level at the moment. Hopefully as the season progresses we might see you on the field but you're a bit over qualified for us at the moment :P

Regards 

Vucari
I know both and try to ANSWER and im silver 2 my age is 16 years old !
